attributes.action: honor Richard Dawkins with a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Evolutionary Biologist Dr Richard Dawkins is our modern day genious.He is a strong voice for atheism and science.
He has contributed his life to the good of our only one life on earth. He deserves an award.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
